summary: Houses (& furniture), horses and followers are now ten, five or two-point-five times more expensive.
descriptionHtml:
[u]What it does:[/u]

Multiplies the price of houses (& furniture), horses and followers by ten.
That\'s it, enjoy...

5x and 2.5x version available now.


[u]Note:[/u]

- I\'ve only tested Breezehome, one stable and one follower. - but others should be fine too.

- I recommend [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13348]Horse Armors for Skyrim by Mystikhybrid / Gabriel Gullbergh[/url]. Horses are now worth the 10.000 !

- x10 is too hard in your opinion ? Let me know in the comments section and I will probably upload different versions. 

- This is my first mod.


[u]Mods which might interest you as well:[/u]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16231]- Reduced Gold Rewards for Quests[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2762]- Cutthroat Merchants[/url]


[u]My mods:[/u]

I. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15833]   Expensive Investments[/url]
II. [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15885] Power of Restoration[/url]
III.[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19446] The Skyrim Distance Overhaul [/url]





4 8 15 16 23 42
author: Grieche
